img_text: YA KNOW,I AM GETTING A LITTLE TIRED OF THE SAME PEOPLE WHO HATE OUR COUNTRY HATE OUR CONSTITUTION, HATE OUR MILITARY AND POLICE, HATE OUR NATIONAL ANTHEM, HATE OUR FLAG, AND HATE OUR CULTURE WHITE HOUSE WASHINGTON BUT NOT OUR HARD EARNED TAX DOLLARS THEY GET FROM WELFARE WHILE SITTING ON THEIR ASSES.
